00018 const double BEAM_WIDTH = 3.0;
00019 
00020 
00021 string
00022 normalize(const string & s)
00023 {
00024   string tmp(s);
00025   for (size_t i = 0; i < tmp.size(); i++) {
00026     if (isdigit(tmp[i])) tmp[i] = '#';
00027   }
00028   return tmp;
00029 }
00030 
00031 void
00032 viterbi(vector<Token> & vt, const ME_Model & me)
00033 {
00034   if (vt.size() == 0) return;
00035 
00036   vector< vector<double> > mat;
00037   vector< vector<int> > bpm;
00038 
00039   vector<double> vd(me.num_classes());
00040   for (size_t j = 0; j < vd.size(); j++) vd[j] = 0;
00041 
00042   mat.push_back(vd);
00043 
00044   for (size_t i = 0; i < vt.size(); i++) {
00045 
00046     vector<double> vd(me.num_classes());
00047     for (size_t j = 0; j < vd.size(); j++) vd[j] = -999999;
00048     vector<int> bp(me.num_classes());
00049 
00050     double maxl = -999999;
00051     for (size_t j = 0; j < vd.size(); j++) {
00052       if (mat[i][j] > maxl) maxl = mat[i][j];
00053     }
00054 
00055     for (size_t j = 0; j < vd.size(); j++) {
00056       if (mat[i][j] < maxl - BEAM_WIDTH) continue; // beam thresholding
00057 
00058       string prepos = me.get_class_label(j);
00059       if (i == 0) {
00060         if (j > 0) continue;
00061         prepos = "BOS";
00062       }
00063       //      prepos = me.get_class_name(j);
00064       //      if (i == 0 && prepos != "BOS") continue;
00065 
00066       ME_Sample mes = mesample(vt, i, prepos);
00067       vector<double> membp = me.classify(mes);
00068       for (size_t k = 0; k < vd.size(); k++) {
00069         double l = mat[i][j] + log(membp[k]);
00070         if (l > vd[k]) {
00071           bp[k] = j;
00072           vd[k] = l;
00073         }
00074       }
00075     }
00076     mat.push_back(vd);
00077     //    for (int k = 0; k < vd.size(); k++) cout << bp[k] << " ";
00078     //    cout << endl;
00079     bpm.push_back(bp);
00080   }
00081   //  cout << "viterbi ";
00082   int max_prd = 0;
00083   int n = vt.size();
00084   for (size_t j = 0; j < vd.size(); j++) {
00085     double l = mat[n][j];
00086     if (l > mat[n][max_prd]) {
00087       max_prd = j;
00088     }
00089   }
00090   vt[n-1].prd = me.get_class_label(max_prd);
00091   for (int i = vt.size() - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
00092     //    cout << max_prd << " ";
00093     //    cerr << max_prd << " ";
00094     if (max_prd < 0 || max_prd >= me.num_classes()) exit(0);
00095     max_prd = bpm[i+1][max_prd];
00096     vt[i].prd = me.get_class_label(max_prd);
00097   }
00098   //  cout << endl;
00099 
00100 }
00101 
00102 string postag(const string & s, const ME_Model & me)
00103 {
00104   list<string> lt;
00105   tokenize(s, lt);
00106 
00107   vector<Token> vt;
00108   for (list<string>::const_iterator i = lt.begin(); i != lt.end(); i++) {
00109     vt.push_back(Token(*i, "?"));
00110   }
00111 
00112   viterbi(vt, me);
00113 
00114   string tmp;
00115   for (size_t i = 0; i < vt.size(); i++) {
00116     if (i == 0) tmp += vt[i].str + "/" + vt[i].prd;
00117     else        tmp += " " + vt[i].str + "/" + vt[i].prd;
00118   }
00119   return tmp;
00120 }
